data.message: I dislike FB forcing us to use our real names as its not only a security issue but sometimes we dont want family and some freinds to see it! Please stop being name police and allow us to choose our own names for OUR accounts

replies.message: Hi Amanda. Facebook requires everyone to provide their real names so you always know who you're connecting with. If you'd like your account to show another name you're known by, you can add an alternate name to your account. Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1tA6uVq  -Ryan
that sounds like a cookie cutter answer and does not make me feel better at all
Whats the point of having a facebook if you wanna use a fake name? That just ruins the whole point.. if you wanna do that, why not go on Twitter?

Amanda, if you're not satisfied with the way Facebook works, leave. We're all here because we enjoy it so head over to a different platform where you can hide your profile under a fake name. Totally with you on this one, Zahar.
sorry i dont enjoy being stalked. Im sorry if you do
THANKS YOU FACEBOOK
many ppl dont wish to give out thier personal info. You can have so many bad things happen. Stealing your indenity to rapists :/
The only thing that people can see is your name, it's not like they give out your address birthdate an social security number XD
you can find alot with someones full name , kiddo
Especially when you use your full name...not exactly helping your cause there.
yup. i dont have a choice as i said. Fb made me use it :)
Make a different account. I see all kinds of obviously fake names posting all over FB.
i did ty

And Amanda , if I were you I would lose the middle name online. I could look you up , use your location listed on FB and find out all kinds of things about any of you, whether it is free or by paying 5 bucks on Intelius or another source like that. I believe that is what was concerning Miss Amanda.
as i said, i cant . Fb added it all in themselves and wont allow me to change it!

How can "Facebook" add information if you didn't provide it? You had to have put in your middle name in order for it to be listed for all to see. Now I have had my Facebook since 2006. Lots of things have changed. And yes, Facebook is always asking you to update your info. But I have not once come across anything that is mandatory to I put. I check my security settings every few months to make sure nothing has changed in order to protect myself as best as I can. Pull up your profile settings and make whatever edits are necessary to you.
actually they ask for you ID and then they input whats on your id. my id has my full name tyvm :)
and AGAIN, they wont let me edit.
I have several friends who don't use their real name... And they have changed it without creating a new account. I don't know what you're talking about they ask for your ID.
look it up. They ask you for your ID. They did it to tons of ppl

^if your that worried about the privacy an stuff, then you should get off the internet all together LOL and I think you got scammed on the ID thing or something because you are allowed to have a Facebook at 13- so where are they getting an ID? Lmao
Also stay away from drama and people won't stalk you! Haha
LOL OKAY :D shows how much you know! LOLOLOLO LMAO :DDD
My sister changes her name about once a year too!
Anything you put as info can be edited also. I've changed lots of things.
